title: How to get admission in a college in 2020 - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no real need to panic. The lifestyles are totally changed due to this pandemic. In this crisis all are equally affected be it rich or poor male or female. We need time so that our lives return to normal pase. Colleges are releasing certain guidelines. Keep a look at the site of the college you wish to apply. The admission process will be through online mode where you need to upload your documents. Just keep a check and remain calm. Stay home. Stay safe. All the best !
